table.caption: Online offer (According to your requirements ， fill in the relevant data as below ， match the relevant price.)
Online offer (According to your requirements ， fill in the relevant data as below ， match the relevant price.)
Online offer (According to your requirements ， fill in the relevant data as below ， match the relevant price.)

div.h2: Choose the type of order you want
div.p: Select the type of order you want and click on "Quotation Now".
Immersion gold area is smaller than 30%, if over this value ,pls offer detail。

t.div:
Special Lamination / Special Hole Sizes / Special Stack Up are not included, Please select your choices by checking the
Special needs listed below.

div.t-att-class: 'cpo-box cpo_rogers_data cpo-block' if material == 'Rogers' else 'cpo-box cpo_rogers_data cpo-none'
'cpo-box cpo-board-thickness cpo-block' if material == 'FR4' else 'cpo-box cpo-board-thickness cpo-none'

t.t-if: silkscreen_color != 'Matt Blue' and silkscreen_color != 'Matt green' and silkscreen_color != 'Matt black' and silkscreen_color != 'Transparent'

option.t-att: ['selected' if not surface and not immersion_gold_thickness else 'data-cpo', '']
['selected' if cpo_gold_thick == 0 or not cpo_gold_thick else 'data-cpo', '']

div.t-att-class: 'col-md-12 col-sm-12 cpo-tips-content' if immersion_gold_thickness else 'col-md-12 col-sm-12 cpo-tips-content cpo-none'
div.p: Immersion gold area is smaller than 30%, if over this value ,pls offer detail。

div.t-att-class: 'form-group cpo-finger-box' if cpo_gold_thick else 'form-group cpo-finger-box cpo-none'

t.div:
Special Lamination / Special Hole Sizes / Special Stack Up are not included, Please select your choices by checking the
Special needs listed below.

div.p: The following data does not currently support automatic quotes !
The following data does not currently support automatic quotes !

div.h4: Dear user, please confirm the data you filled in before creating!

t.p: Haven't you uploaded the file yet?
Haven't you uploaded the file yet?
